item.title: If you're traveling for the upcoming holiday weekend, prepar
item.description: If you're traveling for the upcoming holiday weekend, prepare for a safe & fun adventure by being aware of extreme heat risks, Transportation Security Administration - TSA guidelines, travel safety, & weather forecasts. Download the FEMA App before you go to get real time alerts for up to five locations: fema.gov/app

item.title: Scattered to numerous thunderstorms are possible, primarily
item.description: Scattered to numerous thunderstorms are possible, primarily across the Virginias, this afternoon and evening. Expect hot and humid conditions again through the early afternoon, prior to any thunderstorms, with high temperatures in the 80s and 90s. Main hazards with storms today are damaging winds, and heavy rainfall that may result in localized flooding. Stay weather aware today, and have multiple ways to receive warnings.
